greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse Euler transform of primes.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: For[i = 1, i <= n, i++, AppendTo[s, i*pp[[i]] - Sum[s[[d]]*pp[[i-d]], {d, i-1}]]];
Table[Sum[If[Divisible[i, d], MoebiusMu[i/d], 0]*s[[d]], {d, 1, i}]/i, {i, n}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 10 2019 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
